name: picture-link
description: Allows you to click people's profile pictures and banners in their user modal to open them in your browser..
author: Mario <mariovparaschiv@gmail.com> (github.com/localip)

scripts.package: rm -rf packer && mkdir packer && cp -r manifest.json packer/manifest.json && cp -r dist packer/dist && asar pack packer packed.asar && rm -rf packer
